question: What can TACC users use MATLAB for?
Should I launch MATLAB jobs on login nodes?
desired answer: Do NOT launch MATLAB on the login nodes

question: Where can I submit my MATLAB jobs?
desired answer: on the TACC resources, e.g. Frontera, Stampede3, or Lonestar6

question: Why can I not use MATLAB on login nodes?
desired answer: This may fail and, more importantly, it will prevent other users from doing their work, as your execution will take up too many cycles on the shared login node

question: What is the command to invoke MATLAB?
What is the standard way to submit a Slurm job?
How do I submit a Slurm job?
How is using login nodes for MATLAB jobs system abuse?
desired answer: it will prevent other users from doing their work, as your execution will take up too many cycles on the shared login node
